attributes.title: TRUST ME AS I AM INTRODUCING ME, YOU WILL RADIATE PARAMASHIVA! |13 JULY 2021
attributes.description:
13 JULY 2021, WEDNESDAY (IST)

THE SUPREME PONTIFF OF HINDUISM (SPH), JAGATGURU MAHASANNIDHANAM (JGM), HIS DIVINE HOLINESS (HDH) BHAGAVAN NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM REVEALED PARAMASHIVAâ€™S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA DURING THE LIVE SATSANG ON 13 JULY 2021, WEDNESDAY (IST)

THE JOY YOU RADIATE, THE BLISS YOU  MANIFEST, THE GRATITUDE BLISS TEARS IN YOUR EYES ARE ONLY THE OFFERINGS I MAKE TO MY GURUS. 

I WILL CONTINUE TO WORK FOR THE SMILE IN YOUR LIPS, THE BLISS TEARS IN YOUR EYES, THE SWEETNESS YOU EXPERIENCE IN YOUR HEART. I WILL CONTINUE TO WORK FOR THAT. I AM ALIVE, AND THIS IS MY LIFE AND THIS IS MY PURPOSE.

READ MORE AT: https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=358686798957491&id=100044485207419&sfnsn=wiwspmo
